SPOCKApp¶

Planification of SPECULOOS targets observations App

Launch the App¶

To launch the app open notebook SPOCKapp.ipynb and click on run all cells. You get the following visual: Then Follow the videos in Quick start videos to learn how to use SPOCKapp.

Quick start videos¶

  • Long term, i.e SPECULOOS core program

First pick the date range for which you wish to make plans and for which observatory, then click the run button. The run should last approximatively 40s per day.

When completed a table summarizing the night block each day will be displayed. If you are ok with this proposition click on ` `save plans`

  • Short term, i.e SPECULOOS core program
